original: Blogger DJ Akademiks held a three-hour stream in honor of Takeoff, in which he analyzed videos from the moment of the murder of Kirshnik, and also called for fighting the ideology of violence in hip-hop, including stop imitating rappers YNW Melly and Tay-K, who were convicted of murder.
simplified: In honor of Takeoff, blogger DJ Akademiks hosted a three-hour stream in which he examined videos related to the murder of Kirshnik and promoted a shift away from the violent ideology found in hip-hop, including stopping the imitation of rappers YNW Melly and Tay-K who were both convicted of murder.

original: The sitcom series features the story of Abi (played by Bolu Essien) who secures a job at a top advertising agency in Lagos, although she had a rough start with her superior, she soon got an opportunity to shine at work when she was promoted to become the acting manager after the manager traveled to another branch.
simplified: The sitcom series features the story of Abi (Played by Bolu Essien) who gets a job at a top advertising agency in Lagos.

original: The sitcom series features the story of Abi (played by Bolu Essien) who secures a job at a top advertising agency in Lagos, although she had a rough start with her superior, she soon got an opportunity to shine at work when she was promoted to become the acting manager after the manager traveled to another branch.
simplified: Abi (played by Bolu Essien) had a difficult beginning at a top Lagos advertising agency. || Despite this, she was promoted to become the temporary manager when the original manager had to go to a different branch.

original: The sitcom series features the story of Abi (played by Bolu Essien) who secures a job at a top advertising agency in Lagos, although she had a rough start with her superior, she soon got an opportunity to shine at work when she was promoted to become the acting manager after the manager traveled to another branch.
simplified: Abi (played by Bolu Essien) is featured in the sitcom series. || At first, her supervisor was tough on her. || However, she was promoted to acting manager when the manager traveled to another branch, and this gave her an opportunity to show her abilities at work.

original: The sitcom series features the story of Abi (played by Bolu Essien) who secures a job at a top advertising agency in Lagos, although she had a rough start with her superior, she soon got an opportunity to shine at work when she was promoted to become the acting manager after the manager traveled to another branch.
simplified: The series features the story of Abi (played by Bolu Essien) who gets a job at a top advertising agency in Lagos. || She soon gets a chance to shine at work when she is promoted to become the acting manager after the manager travels to another branch.

original: On November 2, 2022, Poland's Minister of National Defence Mariusz Blaszczak announces the construction of a barrier along the border with the Russian exclave of Kaliningrad, as Poland believes that Russia will use the border to illegally transport African and Asian immigrants to Europe.
simplified: On November 2, 2022, Poland's Minister of National Defense Mariusz Blaszczak said Poland will build a barrier along the border with the Russian exclave of Kaliningrad.

original: On November 2, 2022, Poland's Minister of National Defence Mariusz Blaszczak announces the construction of a barrier along the border with the Russian exclave of Kaliningrad, as Poland believes that Russia will use the border to illegally transport African and Asian immigrants to Europe.
simplified: On November 2, 2022, Poland's Minister of National Defence, Mariusz Blaszczak, proclaimed that they would build a wall along their border with the Russian region of Kaliningrad. || Poland suspects that Russia may use this border to smuggle African and Asian immigrants into Europe.

original: On November 2, 2022, Poland's Minister of National Defence Mariusz Blaszczak announces the construction of a barrier along the border with the Russian exclave of Kaliningrad, as Poland believes that Russia will use the border to illegally transport African and Asian immigrants to Europe.
simplified: On November 2, 2022, Mariusz Blaszczak, Poland's Minister of National Defence, announced plans to build a barrier along the border with Kaliningrad, a Russian exclave. || Poland fears that Russia might use the border to smuggle African and Asian immigrants into Europe.

original: On November 2, 2022, Poland's Minister of National Defence Mariusz Blaszczak announces the construction of a barrier along the border with the Russian exclave of Kaliningrad, as Poland believes that Russia will use the border to illegally transport African and Asian immigrants to Europe.
simplified: On November 2, 2022, Poland's Minister of National Defence Mariusz Blaszczak announces the construction of a barrier along the border with the Russian exclave of Kaliningrad. || Poland believes that Russia will use the border to illegally transport African and Asian immigrants to Europe.

original: An activist hiding his identity said the Egyptian authorities were carrying out random detentions ahead of COP, where they are randomly stopping people and inspecting their mobile phones to look for any evidence of dissent.
simplified: An activist hiding his identity said the Egyptian authorities were carrying out random detentions ahead of COP. || They are randomly stopping people and inspecting their mobile phones to look for any evidence of dissent.

original: An activist hiding his identity said the Egyptian authorities were carrying out random detentions ahead of COP, where they are randomly stopping people and inspecting their mobile phones to look for any evidence of dissent.
simplified: An activist said the Egyptian authorities were carrying out random detentions ahead of Cop. || They are randomly stopping people and looking at their mobile phones to look for any evidence of dissent.

original: An activist hiding his identity said the Egyptian authorities were carrying out random detentions ahead of COP, where they are randomly stopping people and inspecting their mobile phones to look for any evidence of dissent.
simplified: An anonymous activist stated that the Egyptian government was arresting people randomly before COP; they were stopping individuals and searching their phones for signs of disagreement.

original: An activist hiding his identity said the Egyptian authorities were carrying out random detentions ahead of COP, where they are randomly stopping people and inspecting their mobile phones to look for any evidence of dissent.
simplified: A person who wanted to remain anonymous said the Egyptian government is randomly arresting people before a big gathering called COP. || They are checking people's phones to find out if anyone is opposing the government.

original: Bone has published numerous books including Fantastic Fungi Community Cookbook (2021), which includes recipes by wild mushroom foragers, mycologists, and chefs specializing in mushroom-based dishes.
simplified: Bone has published many books including " Fantastic Fungi Community Cookbook ", which includes recipes by wild mushroom foragers, mycologists, and chefs specializing in mushroom-based dishes.
